trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This permission distinguishes between the following four types of file IO access provided by <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>:
trans-unit.target: 此權限區分檔案 IO 存取提供下列四種<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>:

trans-unit.source: `Read`: Read access to the contents of the file or access to information about the file, such as its length or last modification time.
trans-unit.target: `Read`： 可讀取的檔案或檔案，例如它的長度或上次修改時間的相關資訊的存取權的內容。

trans-unit.source: `Write`: Write access to the contents of the file or access to change information about the file, such as its name.
trans-unit.target: `Write`： 變更檔案，例如其名稱的相關資訊之存取權的檔案內容的寫入存取權。

trans-unit.source: Also allows for deletion and overwriting.
trans-unit.target: 也可以刪除和覆寫。

trans-unit.source: `Append`: Ability to write to the end of a file only.
trans-unit.target: `Append`： 可寫入至檔案結尾。

trans-unit.source: No ability to read.
trans-unit.target: 無法讀取。

trans-unit.source: `PathDiscovery`: Access to the information in the path itself.
trans-unit.target: `PathDiscovery`： 存取本身的路徑中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: This helps protect sensitive information in the path, such as user names, as well as information about the directory structure that is revealed in the path.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於保護機密資訊的路徑，例如使用者名稱與路徑中所顯示的目錄結構的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This value does not grant access to files or folders represented by the path.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不能存取由路徑表示的檔案或資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Giving <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write> access to an assembly is similar to granting it full trust.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write>存取組件是類似於授與完全信任。

trans-unit.source: If an application should not write to the file system, it should not have <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write> access.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式不應該寫入至檔案系統，它不應該有<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write>存取。

trans-unit.source: All these permissions are independent, meaning that rights to one do not imply rights to another.
trans-unit.target: 所有這些權限是獨立的這表示其中一個權限不代表另一個權限。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Write` permission does not imply permission to `Read` or `Append`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Write`權限不代表權限`Read`或`Append`。

trans-unit.source: If more than one permission is desired, they can be combined using a bitwise OR as shown in the code example that follows.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要使用多個權限，也可以結合使用位元 OR，下列程式碼範例所示。

trans-unit.source: File permission is defined in terms of canonical absolute paths; calls should always be made with canonical file paths.
trans-unit.target: 檔案使用權限的定義是根據標準的絕對路徑。呼叫應該一律會產生標準的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> describes protected operations on files and folders.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> 描述檔案和資料夾上的受保護的作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File> class helps provide secure access to files and folders.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File>類別可協助提供檔案和資料夾的安全存取。

trans-unit.source: The security access check is performed when the handle to the file is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立檔案控制代碼時，將執行安全性的存取檢查。

trans-unit.source: By doing the check at creation time, the performance impact of the security check is minimized.
trans-unit.target: 藉由在建立時的檢查，安全性檢查的效能影響降至最低。

trans-unit.source: Opening a file happens once, while reading and writing can happen multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案就會發生一次，而讀取和寫入可能會發生多次。

trans-unit.source: Once the file is opened, no further checks are done.
trans-unit.target: 一旦開啟檔案時，不再需要執行檢查。

trans-unit.source: If the object is passed to an untrusted caller, it can be misused.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件傳遞至不受信任的呼叫端時，可能會誤用。

trans-unit.source: For example, file handles should not be stored in public global statics where code with less permission can access them.
trans-unit.target: 例如，檔案控制代碼應該不會儲存在公用的全域靜態程式碼與較低權限可以存取。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> specifies actions that can be performed on the file or folder.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> 指定可以在檔案或資料夾上執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: In addition, these actions can be combined using a bitwise OR to form complex instances.
trans-unit.target: 此外，這些動作可以結合以形成複雜的執行個體使用位元 OR 運算。

trans-unit.source: Access to a folder implies access to all the files it contains, as well as access to all the files and folders in its subfolders.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾的存取權表示其中的內容，並且可存取所有檔案和資料夾及其子資料夾中的所有檔案的存取權。

trans-unit.source: For example, `Read` access to C:\folder1\ implies `Read` access to C:\folder1\file1.txt, C:\folder1\folder2\\, C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`Read`存取 C:\folder1\ 意指`Read`存取 C:\folder1\file1.txt，C:\folder1\folder2\\，C:\folder1\folder2\file2.txt，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: In versions of the .NET Framework before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], you could use the <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to prevent inadvertent access to system resources by trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 在之前的.NET Framework 的版本中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，您可以使用<xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以防止不當存取系統資源所信任的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> is now obsolete, and access to resources is now determined solely by the granted permission set for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission.Deny%2A> 現在已過時，和資源的存取權現在僅取決於授與的權限集合組件。

trans-unit.source: To limit access to files, you must run partially trusted code in a sandbox and assign it permissions only to resources that the code is allowed to access.
trans-unit.target: 若要限制存取檔案，您必須在沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，並指派給它的權限程式碼可以存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: For information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需在沙箱中執行應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 執行部分信任程式碼在沙箱中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following examples illustrate code that uses <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明使用的程式碼<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>。

trans-unit.source: After the following two lines of code, the object `f` represents permission to read all files on the client computer's local disks.
trans-unit.target: 在下列兩行程式碼，該物件之後`f`代表電腦的本機磁碟讀取用戶端上的所有檔案的權限。

trans-unit.source: The code example then demands the permission to determine whether the application has permission to read the files.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例，然後要求來判斷應用程式是否有讀取檔案的權限的權限。

trans-unit.source: After the following two lines of code, the object `f2` represents permissions to read C:\test_r and read and write to C:\example\out.txt.
trans-unit.target: 在下列兩行程式碼，該物件之後`f2`代表讀取 C:\test_r 與讀取和寫入至 C:\example\out.txt 的權限。

trans-unit.source: `Read` and `Write` represent the file/folder permissions as previously described.
trans-unit.target: `Read` 和`Write`代表如先前所述的檔案/資料夾權限。

trans-unit.source: After creating the permission, the code demands the permission to determine whether the application has the right to read and write to the file.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限之後, 程式碼會要求以判斷應用程式是否具有讀取和寫入檔案的權限的權限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> class with fully restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的完全受限制或不受限制的使用權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 會建立完全受限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`檔案和目錄的存取。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> class with fully restricted read access.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>類別完全受限制的讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> class with the specified access to the designated file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用對指定檔案或目錄的指定存取權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows only one of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> values to be specified for the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式只允許其中<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>值指定為指定的檔案或目錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A> method to define complex permissions.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A>方法來定義複雜的權限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> class, which provides complete access to the C:\test_r file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>類別，可提供 C:\test_r 檔案的完整存取。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not a valid string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不是有效的字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter does not specify the absolute path to the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不會指定檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the absolute paths of the files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案和目錄之絕對路徑的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> class with the specified access to the designated files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 使用對指定檔案和目錄的指定存取權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows only one <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value to be specified for the specified files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓一個<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>對指定的檔案和目錄指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A> method to define complex permissions.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A>方法來定義複雜的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An entry in the <paramref name="pathList" /> array is not a valid string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pathList" /> 陣列中的項目不是有效的字串。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlActions" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlActions" /> 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> class with the specified access to the designated file or directory and the specified access rights to file control information.
trans-unit.target: 使用對指定檔案或目錄的指定存取權限以及對檔案控制項資訊的指定存取權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows only one <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value to be specified for the specified file or directories.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓一個<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>指定所指定的檔案或目錄的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A> method to define complex permissions.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A>方法來定義複雜的權限。

trans-unit.source: The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the file or directory specified by `path` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed.
trans-unit.target: `control`參數會指定是否的存取控制清單 (ACL) 的檔案或目錄所指定`path`可以變更，檢視，或無法存取。

trans-unit.source: An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties.
trans-unit.target: 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.
trans-unit.target: 能夠變更或檢視 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not a valid string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不是有效的字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter does not specify the absolute path to the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不會指定檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlActions" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlActions" /> 列舉值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the absolute paths of the files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案和目錄之絕對路徑的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> class with the specified access to the designated files and directories and the specified access rights to file control information.
trans-unit.target: 使用對指定檔案和目錄的指定存取權限以及對檔案控制項資訊的指定存取權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows only one <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value to be specified for the specified files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓一個<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>對指定的檔案和目錄指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A> method to define complex permissions.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%2A>方法來定義複雜的權限。

trans-unit.source: The `control` parameter specifies whether the access control list (ACL) for the file or directory specified by `path` can be changed, viewed, or cannot be accessed.
trans-unit.target: `control`參數會指定是否的存取控制清單 (ACL) 的檔案或目錄所指定`path`可以變更，檢視，或無法存取。

trans-unit.source: An access control list (ACL) describes individuals or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file and its properties.
trans-unit.target: 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人或群組已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案和其屬性上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: The ability to change or view an ACL is an important permission and should be granted with caution.
trans-unit.target: 能夠變更或檢視 ACL 是重要的權限，而且應該被授與時多加注意。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An entry in the <paramref name="pathList" /> array is not a valid string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pathList" /> 陣列中的項目不是有效的字串。

trans-unit.source: Adds access for the specified files and directories to the existing state of the permission.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的檔案和目錄存取加入權限的現有狀態。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of a file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Adds access for the specified file or directory to the existing state of the permission.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的檔案或目錄存取加入權限的現有狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to modify file and directory access by adding to the state of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來修改檔案和目錄存取加入至目前的權限狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%28System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AddPathList%28System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not a valid string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不是有效的字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter did not specify the absolute path to the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數未指定檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="path" /> parameter has an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數的格式無效。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the absolute paths of the files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案和目錄之絕對路徑的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds access for the specified files and directories to the existing state of the permission.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的檔案和目錄存取加入權限的現有狀態。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to modify file and directory access by adding to the state of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來修改檔案和目錄存取加入至目前的權限狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An entry in the <paramref name="pathList" /> array is not valid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pathList" /> 陣列中的項目無效。

trans-unit.source: An entry in the <paramref name="pathList" /> array has an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pathList" /> 陣列中的項目格式無效。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="pathList" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pathList" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permitted access to all files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許的所有檔案存取。

trans-unit.source: The set of file I/O flags for all files.
trans-unit.target: 所有檔案的檔案 I/O 旗標集合。

trans-unit.source: This property gets or sets the permitted access to all files on the local computer and network drives.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取得或設定在本機電腦與網路磁碟機上的所有檔案的允許的存取。

trans-unit.source: An individual <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation.
trans-unit.target: 個別<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>值可以檢查使用的位元 AND 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AllFiles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AllFiles%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permitted access to all local files.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定允許的所有本機檔案存取。

trans-unit.source: The set of file I/O flags for all local files.
trans-unit.target: 所有本機檔案的檔案 I/O 旗標集合。

trans-unit.source: Local files are files contained on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 本機檔案是包含在本機電腦上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Any files not accessed through a network drive are local files.
trans-unit.target: 透過網路磁碟機不存取任何檔案是本機檔案。

trans-unit.source: An individual <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess> value can be checked for using a bitwise AND operation.
trans-unit.target: 個別<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>值可以檢查使用的位元 AND 運算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AllLocalFiles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.AllLocalFiles%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 目前權限的複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 複製的權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> object to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 物件是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 物件，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding used to reconstruct the permission.
trans-unit.target: 用以重新建構權限的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 參數不是有效的使用權限項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter's version number is not compatible.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="esd" /> 參數的版本號碼不相容。

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> object that is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 物件的雜湊碼，其適合用於雜湊表這類的雜湊演算法和資料結構。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> 物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for two instances of the same permission might be different, hence a hash code should not be used to compare two <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> objects.
trans-unit.target: 相同的權限的兩個執行個體的雜湊程式碼可能會不同，因此雜湊程式碼不應比較兩個<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> values that represents a single type of file access.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值，表示單一檔案存取類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets all files and directories with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 取得所有的檔案和目錄。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the paths of the files and directories to which access specified by the <paramref name="access" /> parameter is granted.
trans-unit.target: 一個陣列，包含可以由 <paramref name="access" /> 參數所授與之權限存取的檔案及目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to get the state of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來取得目前的權限狀態。

trans-unit.source: To get the state of both `Read` and `Write` access, two calls to this method are required.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得兩者的狀態`Read`和`Write`存取，兩個呼叫這個方法所需。

trans-unit.source: The `access` parameter is limited to the values of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>, which represent single types of file access.
trans-unit.target: `access`參數僅限於值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess>，代表單一類型的檔案存取。

trans-unit.source: Those values are <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write>, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append>, and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery>.
trans-unit.target: 這些值是<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write>， <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append>，和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery>。

trans-unit.source: The values acceptable to `access` do not include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess> and <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.AllAccess>, which do not represent single types of file access.
trans-unit.target: 可接受的值`access`不包含<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.AllAccess>，這不代表單一類型的檔案存取。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.GetPathList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.GetPathList%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="access" /> is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 的有效值。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="access" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.AllAccess" />, which represents more than one type of file access, or <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />, which does not represent any type of file access.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 是表示一個以上檔案存取類型的 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.AllAccess" />，或是不表示任何檔案存取類型的 <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.NoAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 目前的權限是指定權限的子集，如果目前權限會指定一組作業所包含的指定權限。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission that represents read access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents read access to C:\\.
trans-unit.target: 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的讀取存取權限是到 c： 代表讀取存取權限的子集\\。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified access to the specified files and directories, replacing the existing state of the permission.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定檔案和目錄的指定存取權，取代使用權限的現有狀態。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: 檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified access to the specified file or directory, replacing the existing state of the permission.
trans-unit.target: 設定指定檔案或目錄的指定存取權，取代使用權限的現有狀態。

trans-unit.source: The previous state of the current permission for the specified access type is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 會覆寫先前指定的存取類型的目前權限的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code sets the access for C:\temp to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼設定至 C:\temp 存取<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read>。

trans-unit.source: This access will not be overwritten by the following code because the access types are not the same.
trans-unit.target: 此存取權將不會覆寫以下列程式碼因為存取類型不相同。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.SetPathList%28System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.SetPathList%28System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter is not a valid string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數不是有效的字串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="path" /> parameter did not specify the absolute path to the file or directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 參數未指定檔案或目錄的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the absolute paths of the files and directories.
trans-unit.target: 包含檔案和目錄之絕對路徑的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified access to the specified files and directories, replacing the current state for the specified access with the new set of paths.
trans-unit.target: 設定對指定檔案和目錄的指定存取，方法是以一組新的路徑取代指定存取的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: The previous state of the current permission for the specified access type is overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 會覆寫先前指定的存取類型的目前權限的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following code sets the access for C:\temp to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼設定至 C:\temp 存取<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read>。

trans-unit.source: This access will not be overwritten by the following code because the access types are not the same.
trans-unit.target: 此存取權將不會覆寫以下列程式碼因為存取類型不相同。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 參數不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
An entry in the <paramref name="pathList" /> parameter is not a valid string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pathList" /> 參數中的項目不是有效的字串。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 權限的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

trans-unit.source: It must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫的結果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission.Union%2A>是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="other" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="other" /> 參數不是 <see langword="null" />，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。
